title: enable-debug/optimize build: compile-fail/issue-22638.rs stack-oflo'ing

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
configure args:

```
CFG_CONFIGURE_ARGS   := --enable-debug --enable-optimize --enable-ccache --prefix=~/opt/rust-dbg --disable-optimize-tests --disable-llvm-assertions
```

`make-check` is failing with:

```
failures:

---- [compile-fail] compile-fail/issue-22638.rs stdout ----

error: failure produced the wrong error: signal: 11
status: signal: 11
command: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/bin/rustc /home/fklock/Dev/Mozilla/rust.git/src/test/compile-fail/issue-22638.rs -L x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/compile-fail/ --target=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -L x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/compile-fail/issue-22638.stage2-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.compile-fail.libaux -C prefer-dynamic -o x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/compile-fail/issue-22638.stage2-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --cfg rtopt -L x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/rt
stdout:
------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------
stderr:
------------------------------------------

thread 'rustc' has overflowed its stack
------------------------------------------

thread '[compile-fail] compile-fail/issue-22638.rs' panicked at 'explicit panic', /home/fklock/Dev/Mozilla/rust.git/src/compiletest/runtest.rs:1501


failures:
    [compile-fail] compile-fail/issue-22638.rs

test result: FAILED. 1998 passed; 1 failed; 9 ignored; 0 measured

thread '<main>' panicked at 'Some tests failed', /home/fklock/Dev/Mozilla/rust.git/src/compiletest/compiletest.rs:246
/home/fklock/Dev/Mozilla/rust.git/mk/tests.mk:766: recipe for target 'tmp/check-stage2-T-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-H-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-cfail.ok' failed

```
